label: Portable Buildings and Toilets
description: Market category for portable buildings and toilets, including rental and sale options.
intents: Find temporary office or storage space

subcategories.label: Portable Buildings
subcategories.description: Portable buildings for rent or sale, including cabins, offices, and classrooms.

subcategories.label: Portable Toilets
subcategories.description: Portable toilets for rent or sale, including standard and luxury options.

subcategories.label: Mobile Offices
subcategories.description: Mobile offices for rent or sale, including trailers and converted vehicles.

subcategories.label: Welfare Units
subcategories.description: Mobile welfare units for rent or sale, including shower and changing facilities.

subcategories.label: Storage
subcategories.description: Portable storage options for rent or sale, including containers and sheds.
